column4: my wireless stopped working. i tried to connect to it from the list again, and it wouldn't connect. then i restarted, didn't work. updated, didn't work. i checked the hardware drivers from the systems menu, it says its active, but its not in the list in the upper right. then i tried removing and reactivating, that didn't work. any ideas?
Have you restarted the wireless router?
no. how do i do that?
Consult the manual, but usually pulling the plug cures my wireless router.
